beneficiaries.title: Beneficiaries and Purposes
beneficiaries.description: This platform enables all beneficiaries of financial analysis, whether individuals, entities, or organizations, to perform all known types of quantitative financial analysis in the world.
beneficiaries.owners: Helps the company owner to understand his company's financial performance easily and quickly
beneficiaries.analysts: Helps the financial manager or financial analyst to complete his work in a few seconds
beneficiaries.investors: Helps any investor to make an immediate decision to buy shares of a particular company
beneficiaries.banks: Helps bank employees to evaluate the performance of companies to make financing and lending decisions
beneficiaries.valuers: Helps to assess the feasibility of new projects or evaluate companies
beneficiaries.general: Helps all those interested in financial analysis, whether an individual, organization, or entity

step1.title: Attach Your Statements
step1.description: Attach financial statements or trial balances in any format

step2.title: Select Analysis Options
step2.description: Choose the language, sector, activity, and type of analysis required

step3.title: Press the Analysis Button
step3.description: Get a comprehensive and detailed analysis in a few seconds

items.title: Leading the Digital Transformation in Financial Analysis
items.content: By building an advanced Saudi platform capable of global competition in the fields of FinTech and artificial intelligence, to be at the forefront of digital development in the financial analysis sector at the Kingdom and global levels, and to provide advanced smart tools based on artificial intelligence.

items.title: Making Deep Financial Analysis Available at the Click of a Button
items.content: By enabling companies, investors, and financing entities to access comprehensive and rapid financial analyses without the need for specialized technical or financial expertise, which helps decision-makers to anticipate risks, increase returns, and make decisions based on live data.

items.title: Achieving Full Automation of the Analytical Process Stages
items.content: From data collection to the preparation of professional reports, to ensure accuracy and speed in results.

items.title: Achieving Comprehensiveness and Depth in Analysis
items.content: As the platform covers all types of quantitative financial analysis from traditional to advanced AI-based analysis, to provide accurate and reliable insights to users.

items.title: Ensuring Ease of Use
items.content: By designing a simple interactive interface that facilitates the use of the platform's services for all users, regardless of their financial experience.

items.title: Accelerating the Process of Preparing Financial Reports and Analyses
items.content: Which reduces time, cost, and effort for users.

items.title: Raising the Level of Accuracy and Reliability
items.content: By relying on artificial intelligence technologies to bring updated and real-time data (market data, economic data, financial data, industry averages) and ensure the accuracy of calculations and analyses.

items.title: Achieving Sustainable Business Value for Companies and Institutions
items.content: By supporting the making of strategic decisions based on accurate and reliable real-time data.

classical.title: Classical Fundamental Analysis
classical.structural: Structural Analysis of Financial Statements (13 types)

advanced.title: Advanced and Sophisticated Analysis
advanced.forecasting: Forecasting and Credit Rating Models (10 models)

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.client1: A comprehensive and integrated system that helped me understand my company's performance quickly, accurately, and easily. It is a wonderful system that provides all kinds of financial analysis.
testimonials.client2: As a manager and financial analyst, I no longer need to waste my time on long calculations, and all my work has become easier and my meetings more professional.
testimonials.client3: As an investor, I can now make instant investment decisions and confidently identify the stocks of companies I want to invest in.
testimonials.client4: By virtue of my work as an employee responsible for financing and lending operations, the system has benefited me in evaluating companies quickly and accurately.
